includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: An incarcerated Lucious attempts to keep control of the company from behind bars as his family descends into chaos. Second season of the Golden Globe-winning drama series starring Terrence Howard (Iron Man) and Taraji P. Henson (Hidden Figures).

includedIn.title: Empire
includedIn.synopsis: After music mogul and former drug dealer Lucious Lyon is diagnosed with a terminal illness, he pits his three sons against one another to decide who will succeed him.
